PropertyList.title: OH-6 Cayuse
PropertyList.line: The Hughes Helicopters OH-6 Cayuse (nicknamed "Loach", after the requirement
acronym LOH - light Observation Helicopter) is a single-engine light
helicopter with a four-bladed main rotor used for personnel transport,
escort and attack missions, and observation. Hughes also developed the
Model 369 as a civilian helicopter, the Hughes Model 500, currently produced
